item.title: What is this blog about
item.author: Author
item.description: Hi, I am a web application developer and cybersecurity enthusiast from Armenia. On this blog, I am going to post mainly Bug bounty and CTF writeups, reconnaissance techniques, approaches to pentesting and my thoughts on general infosec.
